developerResponse: {'id': 44386719, 'body': "Hey there, we'd love to look into this issue for you. Please can you contact us at badoo.com/feedback so we can do so? You can also message us on our social media (look for @badoohelp!)", 'modified': '2024-06-05T07:42:17Z'}
review:
Sharp decline in the past year and a half. Nearby is bugged showing the same profiles, Encounter stack incidentally shows profiles that aren‚Äôt under Nearby and conveniently removes them from the latter after right swiping. Its upper hand over other dating apps is its ability to view and message profiles in a limited capacity. Between the surge in AI profiles and a cohort of Philippine-based profiles suspiciously looking for relationships predominantly in USA, its compromised the organic flow of the app as your local stack is inundated by users from the Philippines. I would suggest they start locking foreign locations behind any of the several subscription models available ‚Äî ideally a win for its user base by fostering more domestic users while capitalizing on an additional source of revenue.  

That said, for a rather lowkey app, I‚Äôve found the most success over the years with this surpassingly so. Perhaps adding likable blurbs to profiles might just be the next big move as it seems to have lead the top 2 dating apps to success. Weed out the fake AI Asian profiles especially, revamp the UI/UX to be more simplistic ‚Ä¶ maybe more of a base can be established.
title: Needs work

review:
I have tried other dating apps and they all charge for various things and then you pay but they need to see the same people from other apps and so it‚Äôs almost like a big circle between all the apps. Other apps also have tons of fake profiles, some are good and some are horrible.

This dating app is truly a hidden gem that I almost want to keep a secret. Their profiles are legit and I have yet to find a scammer or fake profile. They also offer a ton of communication choices for free just for trying the app and then even after the free trial there‚Äôs still plenty of opportunity to communicate with someone you like. There is a huge range of variety in profiles and I have not found a duplicate yet. The  profiles have lots of ethnic choices, location choices etc. 

This app is definitely worth the time it takes to fill out the short profile!
title: Best App Ever!

As far as the app itself there is only one issue there are plenty of fake profiles that are not photo verified and a lot of them just have pictures and no information. And sometimes the app shows me people that are nowhere near my location. 

The real issue is the people that use the app. 
I noticed a lot of reviews saying that men are the ones that are playing and doing dumb things on this app. BUT. There are a lot of women who are as well. There are that like me and when there is one that I match with and I engage in a conversation with them, they either never respond, or they‚Äôll respond, they talk for a bit and then they stop. Why are you liking my profile if your just gonna ghost me? But then they‚Äôll say that they‚Äôre looking for something serious (interesting). There are also a lot of thirst traps on here that just post sexy photos of themselves to get men to follow them on Instagram and boost their already extremely high egos. 

The reason why I downloaded this app is because I got a lot going on right now and it‚Äôs hard to meet women with my current situation. I assumed downloading this app would make things easier but it didn‚Äôt. I‚Äôm gonna try a few more times and if it still doesn‚Äôt work then I‚Äôm uninstalling. This is nothing against the developers of the app or the app itself, you guys are awesome. There are a lot of cool features on here. But likeI said before the app itself is cool. It‚Äôs just the people.

developerResponse: {'id': 19628174, 'body': "Hi again, thanks for the response. Have you been in touch with our Support Team on social media? We'd really like to help you delete your account and address any other concerns mentioned that you may want to discuss - you can find us @BadooHelp on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.", 'modified': '2020-12-08T20:47:05Z'}
review:
Simply Put Absolutely The Worst Free Dating App - Horrible, Avoid. Getting COVID-19 would be better than getting this worthless piece of garbage.

The developer asked me (via email) to explain why I gave this app the horrid review it deserves, here goes:
1. I cannot delete my profile. The instructions say that if I can‚Äôt it is because I did not verify my email. NOT TRUE! I did verify my email and my email is linked to my account. That is how the developer contacted me, via email - garbage!
2. Most of the profiles are not local women - garbage.
3. The app CONSTANTLY tries to hit you up to pay for the service. Just make a pay for use app and don‚Äôt bill it as free - garbage.
4. You can contact some local users but not others and there is no explanation why - garbage.
5. In my opinion anyone that has used ‚Äúhigh quality‚Äù free dating apps (POF, Bumble, Tinder, Facebook Dating) and then uses this piece of garbage will see the differences immediately. I believe the favorable reviews are 100% fake.
6. All I want from Badoo is to be able to delete my profile and get as far away from this festering, stinky pile of garbage as I can.
Are you happy Badoo?
title: Simply Put Absolutely The Worst Free Dating App - Horrible

Also, there are way too many people from around the world faking their location. I mean ok, I respect people‚Äôs need to chat with people from around the world but that should not be on dating apps. 

Go make a chat app where you can talk with people from around the world, so people know what to expect . Ain‚Äôt nobody has time for this.

developerResponse: {'id': 28795527, 'body': 'Thank you so much for liking our photo verification. This helps us stop people from making fake accounts. You can always turn the GPS off on your phone for better results and then manually enter your location in the app by clicking onto your profile> settings> basic info> locations. With the free version your swipes will be refreshed every 24 hours. Hope this helps!', 'modified': '2022-03-26T13:13:13Z'}
review:
So far, I am liking this app. I like the photo verification, it is reassuring that fake profiles are being minimized. One thing that does get to me about this app though is the amount of people that like me that live hours away. Is there a way to screen this? I am not at all interested in long distance, and it‚Äôs overwhelming the amount of profiles I have to click through only to find out the location does not work for me. Please fix this!

Edit: I was liking this app until my free trial ran out and I was needing to pay to swipe right. What a bummer! I‚Äôm not paying for this app, I refuse. I think they should limit how many likes a day, but to force you to pay to even use it is just ridiculous. Especially in times like this!
title: Meh

developerResponse: {'id': 10357705, 'body': "Sorry to hear this! We work hard to keep a database of high quality real users, and our moderation team works 24/7 to spot any malicious profiles. We also have a photo verification system in place to prevent fake users from using the app. However, if you're suspicious about a profile, please report them and we'll check them immediately.", 'modified': '2019-08-26T13:25:35Z'}
review: The time I spent on this app was very brief. I heard good things about it from other people, but either things have gone downhill, or more bots and fake accounts have plagued the site since it started out. Never have I seen someone who had reached out to me wanting to chat, and then a day later, changed all of their photos, name, and location‚Äîcompleting altering their identity for no apparent reason! Yet the job description and About Me section were the same word-for-word. The quality of ‚Äúreal‚Äù people on the app was barely discernible from the fake accounts. The photos and selection of matches I was seeing were low quality, and purposefully so. I may dislike apps like Tinder and OkCupid, but at least I felt a little safer on those sites and not so manipulated.
title: Disturbing and Fake Accounts

review: App seems great at first, good features, well developed..until you start noticing 99% of people you match have FAKE LOCATIONS! Very disappointing having to question if a local match is even in the same country or side of the world as you from a local location dating app. I tried the app for over 2 weeks, swiped through 100s of profiles, and I never matched more than 5 actual locals. Its absolutely brain rotting these foreigners even want to fake their location and talk to people 5-9 thousand miles away in the first place. Wasting their time and being a burden on the platform. I got the app to meet people for real life, offline connections, not to virtually entertain the world.
title: worst dating app available in 2024
